product_name: Craft AB Light Rain Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: Made with highly breathable and waterproof eVent fabric, the men's AB Light Rain Bike Jacket from Craft is your ticket to staying dry when you're battling hills and rain. Lightweight jacket is windproof, waterproof and breathable. Fleece-lined collar feels good on bare skin. Dropped tail provides extra coverage. Craft AB Light Rain Bike Jacket for men features reflective trim for enhanced visibility.
short_description: Made with highly breathable and waterproof eVent fabric, the men's AB Light Rain Bike Jacket from Craft is your ticket to staying dry when you're battling hills and rain.
